edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.stores

Interface RemoteFileStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockStore, FileStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlusterFileStore

    @DefaultImplementation(value=GlusterFileStore.class)
public interface RemoteFileStore
extends FileStore
    Interface for remote block stores (e.g., GlusterFS, ...).
